---
name: uwf-slide-deck
description: "Generate a slide deck outline + content plan and (optionally) a pptxgenjs implementation scaffold."
---
# UWF Slide Deck Skill

## Output
- slides/outline.md (audience, narrative arc, takeaways)
- slides/content.md (speaker notes, sources, visuals plan)
- (optional) slides/pptx/ (pptxgenjs scaffold)

## Template
See: templates/deck-outline.template.md
